Name: Core Passive: Mechanical Case
Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows
Descriptions: After hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> for 3.5s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case</color> applies a debuff to an enemy, all squad members deal 25% more <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to the target for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>. Cons.Name: Supercharged Bomb
Cons.Effect: The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s

Cons.Name: Charging Device
Cons.Effect: Nicole recovers 5 Energy when <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case's</color> debuff is triggered. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

Cons.Name: Field Expansion
Cons.Effect: When Nicole uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the diameter of the energy field generated at the target location is increased by 3m.

Cons.Name: Corrupting Energy Field
Cons.Effect: When Nicole's energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, all squad member's CRIT Rate against that enemy increases by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
